com.ffbit.maven.solr.extract

Interface BootstrapConfiguration

  • All Superinterfaces:
    SolrVersionConfiguration
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractSolrConfigurationMojo, AbstractSolrMojo, RunSolrMojo, StartSolrMojo

    public interface BootstrapConfiguration
extends SolrVersionConfiguration
    Represents configuration for bootstrapping Apache Solr configuration.
